question: Who has won the  2017 Gerry Weber Open tennis tournament ?
explanation: Roger Federer,  a Swiss professional tennis player, has won the  2017 Gerry Weber Open tennis tournament  by defeating Alexander Zverev in final by 6-1 6-3 at the Gerry Weber Stadion in Halle, Germany. With this win, Federer clinch his 92nd career title.
